strategy: Sautekh Dynasty armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: All Necron formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Sautekh Dynasty

formations.name: 0–1 per army - Tomb Complex
formations.units: The first objective the Necron player places on their own table edge functions both as a Portal and as an objective for the rules purposes. It may not be destroyed. Formations using the Portal should measure from the edge of the board as the formation’s starting point.

formations.name: 0–1 per army - Necron Overlord
formations.units: Replace a Necron Lord in the army with a Necron Overlord.

formations.name: Ghost Ark Mechanised Phalanx
formations.units: Three Ghost Arks, six Necron Warrior one Necron Lord.
extraUnits: Add one Cryptek and one Ghost Ark for 100 points
Add up to three Annihilation Barges for 50 points each
Add up to three Doomsday Arks for 50 points each
Add up to three Wraiths for 50 points each
Add up to three Triarch Stalkers for 50 points each
Swap up to 3 Necron Warriors for Immortals for 25 points each

sections.name: Sautekh Dynasty Support Formations
sections.description: Up to three for each Maynarkh Dynasty Mechanised Phalanx taken

formations.name: Infantry Phalanx
formations.units: Eight Necron Warriors and one Necron Lord
extraUnits: Add up to three Tomb Spyders for 50 points each
Add up to three Wraiths for 50 points each
Add one Cryptek for 50 points
Swap up to 3 Necron Warriors for Immortals for 25 points each
Add One C'tan Shard for 100 points

formations.name: Blade Maniple
extraUnits: Listed Below

formations.name: Iudicium Maniple
formations.units: Five Doomsday Arks or five Annihilation Barges
extraUnits: Add one Command barge with a Lord Character for 50 points

formations.name: Eques Maniple
formations.units: Any six of the following units: Destroyers, Heavy Destroyers
extraUnits: Add One Necron Lord for 25 points
Add up to three Wraiths for 50 points each

formations.name: Monolith Maniple
extraUnits: Add one Obelisk for 50 points
Add up to one Monolith for 75 points

formations.name: Stalker Maniple
extraUnits: Add 0-2 Seraptek Heavy Construct for 125 points each

formations.name: Triarch Phalanx
extraUnits: Add one Necron Lord unit for 25 points
Add one Cryptek character for 50 points
Add two Triarch Praetorian unit for 125 points
Add up to three Triarch Stalkers for 50 points each
Add One C'tan Shard 100 points

sections.name: Maynarkh Dynasty Harvesters
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: 0–1 Harvester Engine
formations.units: One of the following units: Abattoir, Æonic Orb
